description: This file defines a 'Results' page component for a quiz application using the LightningJS framework. It displays the quiz score and includes a button to restart the quiz.

classes.name: Component
classes.description: An extension of LightningJS Blits.Component that represents the Results page in the quiz app.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Returns the initial state object for the component, setting layout positions and styling.

methods.name: components
methods.description: Registers child components, specifically the Button component.

methods.name: onInit
methods.description: Initializes the component state, retrieving score data from the router's state.

methods.name: onReady
methods.description: Sets up the button's press handler to restart the quiz by navigating to the root route.
